data.title: App crashed on iOS 10.1.1
data.body:

- devices test on:iphone6s ios10.1.1
- developing environments
   - NDK version:
   - Xcode version:8.1
   - VS version:
   - browser type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:
1. 在游戏中正常点击操作，到某一个按钮点击时出现crash
2. 游戏版本在所有10.1.1之前的系统上都没有出现问题，但是在10.1.1这个最新的ios系统上才出现了crash

data.title: Last letter in first word not transferred to new line. Label::getFirstWordLen
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.13.1
- devices test on: Win32
Steps to Reproduce:
1.  Create multiline cocos2d::Label with text with one word. Set the content size that was not seen the last half of the letter. The last letter should be transferred to the next line. But its not transferred.

Problem is in function Label::getFirstWordLen. See for code:
for (int index = startIndex + 1; index < textLen; ++index)
Width of first letter not added to word width.

data.title: Sprite3D 的getMeshByName失效
data.body: 原因是 Sprite3D::createNode 方法，存在auto mesh = Mesh::create(nodedata->id, getMeshIndexData(it->subMeshId));导致所有的名字都一样

- copying of Ref is explicitly forbidden
- unneeded inheritance  of Acceleration from Ref removed
- copying of BaseData in cocostudio sources fixed

data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding & cocos_file.json automatically
fixes for iOS 7 and earlier
data.body:
1. `cocos2d::Director` `_invalid` variable must be set to `false` on first init to prevent unwanted return on `CCEAGLView-ios::layoutSubviews` when it called first time.
Improves pull request: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/16394
Fixes issue: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/16876
Also tested that case: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/14276 to prevert regression.


2. Creation and setting the `GLView` should be done after creating the `RootViewController` and after `CCEAGLView` was added to view hierarchy. Otherwise, it can cause a problem when using the landscape orientation, because view will return wrong bounds size.
Improves pull request: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/pull/15792
Fixes issue: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/16565

Tested on:
iPod 4th gen iOS 6.1.6
iPod 5th gen iOS 7.1
iPad mini 2th gen iOS 9.3.5
iPhone 6 iOS 10.1.1

Regression since 3.12 : text from a BMFont is moved a few pixels to the right.
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.13.1
- devices test on: iPhone6
- developing environments : Xcode version: 8.1

Steps to Reproduce:

1. create and display a label from a BMFont : 
Label::createWithBMFont("font_numbers.fnt","2", TextHAlignment::CENTER);

2. In 3.13.1, the text is offset in x of a few pixels (and is partly outside the smaller bounding box)
The problem was not in my previous 3.12 version. 
This is annoying if the try to center the text.


Attached a screenshot of the same code running on 3.12 and 3.13.1.

![3 12](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5639789/20398499/f8c269a8-aced-11e6-8d2f-545d686d931f.png)   -   ![3 13 1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5639789/20398500/f8ebaa02-aced-11e6-85a7-da3e2ac252b2.png)

data.title: Hardcoded `compileSdkVersion` and `buildToolsVersion` at 'build.gradle'.
data.body:
Currently just wanted to test some code, but had stuck with incompatible versions of android build tools.
```
> A problem occurred configuring project ':libcocos2dx'.
  > The SDK Build Tools revision (22.0.1) is too low for project ':libcocos2dx'. Minimum required is 25.0.0
```
So that's how i found hardcoded values at 'build.gradle' of libcocos2dx:
https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/7e2fe05050c6fe88ea6cef5e39344d9a7546fc92/cocos/platform/android/libcocos2dx/build.gradle#L5
It happened cuz i always prefer to use most recent version of gradle and android build tools. But now i have to rollback the gradle and build tools versions what may affect the results of my tests.

So, the good practice in this case is using the extended variables of root project. Smth like this.
```
apply plugin: 'com.android.application'

android {
	if( project.ext.hasProperty( 'compileSdkVersion' ) ) {
		compileSdkVersion project.ext['compileSdkVersion']
	} else {
		compileSdkVersion 23
		// whine to user that the default value is set.
	}
	
	...
```
This code is guarded by checking the corresponded property exists, so it's safe.
I think, it would be great if this values will be configurable from root project.

data.title: editbox doesn't show cursor and input text in android
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.13.1
- devices test on: 乐视手机1
- developing environments
   - NDK version: r10e
   - Xcode version:
   - VS version:
   - browser type and version:
-android:5.0.2
Steps to Reproduce:

1. git clone https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x.git
./download-deps.py 
cd tests/js-tests
cocos run -p android

2. goto Extensions Test->EditBoxTest

3. click the fourth EditBox, 7 times in 10 I won't see the input cursor and inputed text.
![wechatimg1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8563538/20387706/6599458e-acfc-11e6-98e0-39834696bf18.png)

4.when click the down button in the soft keyboard, you will see the inputed text.
![wechatimg2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8563538/20387940/90017a20-acfd-11e6-84bc-8c5ae9d04f59.png)

data.title: CURL have error compile for APP_PLATFORM := android-15
data.body:
Hello!
I'm sorry for my bad english.

- cocos2d-x version: 3.13.1
- devices test on: Android 4.4.2
- developing environments
   - NDK version: r13b
   - VS version: 2015
   - Android API: 24

Steps to Reproduce:

1.  add variable in file **Application.mk** variable: `APP_PLATFORM := android-15`
2.  compile for android

I get error compile:

```
[armeabi] SharedLibrary  : libcocos2dcpp.so
<proj_dir>/proj.android-studio/../cocos2d/external/curl/prebuilt/android/armeabi/libcrypto.a(ui_openssl.o):ui_openssl.c:function read_string_inner: error: undefined reference to 'signal'
<proj_dir>/proj.android-studio/../cocos2d/external/curl/prebuilt/android/armeabi/libcrypto.a(ui_openssl.o):ui_openssl.c:function read_string_inner: error: undefined reference to 'tcsetattr'
<proj_dir>/proj.android-studio/../cocos2d/external/curl/prebuilt/android/armeabi/libcrypto.a(ui_openssl.o):ui_openssl.c:function read_string_inner: error: undefined reference to 'tcsetattr'
<proj_dir>/proj.android-studio/../cocos2d/external/curl/prebuilt/android/armeabi/libcrypto.a(ui_openssl.o):ui_openssl.c:function open_console: error: undefined reference to 'tcgetattr'
collect2.exe: error: ld returned 1 exit status
```


**My solution:**

1. I get old commit in project `https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x-3rd-party-libs-src/`

```
d025d1f97e215b735cb319bedc7f877cd8f0b7d6
Author: zilongshanren <guanghui8827@126.com>
Date:   Wed Apr 6 11:42:33 2016 +0800

    upgrade libcurl to 7.48 and openssl to 1.02g
```

2. Then i replace folder **curl** for my project

Check please last version library curl in project cocos2d.
Thanks You!
